error_analysis.missed_clue: Failure Swing (Lower High) formed just before the drop. Market failed to displace above short-term structure.
error_analysis.concept_correction: Inducement vs. Target. The equal highs at 1.3480 were engineered as inducement to trap longs. The slow bleed down was not a flag, but a slide into a heavy sell program.
error_analysis.future_rule: IF price drifts down but FAILS to displace above the previous short-term high (Failure Swing), assume Bearish continuation, NOT bullish retracement.
